import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-donut-form', templateUrl: './donut-form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./donut-form.component.scss'] }) export class DonutFormComponent { icons:string[]=[ 'caramel-swirl', 'glazed-fudge', 'just-chovolate', 'sour-supreme', 'strawberry-glaze', 'vanilla-sundae', ] handleSubmit(form: NgForm){ if(form.valid){ console.log(form.value) }else{ console.log('is invalid'); form.form.markAllAsTouched() } } }
